review.description: Stores customer reviews with ratings, content, and approval status. Connected to Shopify customers, orders, and products.

shopifyOrder.description: Synchronizes order data from Shopify and tracks review request timing and limits.

shopifyProduct.description: Synchronizes product data from Shopify and stores review metadata in Shopify metafields.

create.description: Creates new customer review and creates a metaobject for that review in Shopify.

update.description: Updates existing review and calls the metadata/review/metaobject/create action to update linked product metafield in Shopify.

install.description: This action creates a review metaobject definition and a corresponding metafield definition in Shopify, and then triggers a data sync for the new shop.

email/send.description: Sends a review request email to a customer and then clears the requestReviewAfter field on the corresponding order to prevent re-sending the email

metadata/review/metafield/create.description: Creates a review metafield on a product in Shopify.

metadata/review/metafield/update.description: Updates the linked review metaobjects on a product in Shopify.

metadata/review/metaobject/create.description: Creates a review metaobject linked to a product in Shopify.

review.description: Merchants can update and manage reviews through the admin interface, including approving or rejecting reviews.

web/routes/_app._index.description: Displays an embedded Shopify Admin UI for merchants to view and manage customer reviews and approval workflow.

web/routes/_app._install.description: Contains a list of installation instructions for extensions linked to this app.

extensions/product-reviews/blocks/produc.description: Shopify theme extension that displays customer reviews and ratings directly on product pages in the storefront.

api/utils/email/render.tsx.description: This file exports a function that uses the react-email library to generate the HTML for a review request email, including a link with a unique code for the user to submit their review.

api/utils/review/liquid/main.liquid.description: This file is used to display the review submission page to the customer.

api/utils/review/liquid/invalid.liquid.description: This file is used to display the invalid review token page.

api/routes/review/GET-[token].description: This route is responsible for displaying the review submission page to the customer.
